definitions.definition: A piece of paper given to students who are late to class.
examples: The teacher gave her a tardy because she did not come into the classroom until after the bell.

definitions.definition: An instance of a student's being marked as tardy by a teacher on the teacher's attendance sheet.

main_definition: ( US ) A piece of paper given to students who are late to class.
secondary_definitions: ( US ) An instance of a student's being marked as tardy by a teacher on the teacher's attendance sheet.
